Texts.Eng: Bring ^orange;Kevin, your overlord^reset; heaps of ^green;Monster Plate^reset;
Can you do me a favor? I need someone to murder like....100 things. I need ^orange;40 Monster Plate^reset; and am far ^green;too lazy^reset; to do it myself. Go on, then. I'll pay.
Thanks. Have this significant sum of money. Also this stupid contract...and this ^red;other thing^reset; I...found. Yea. Found. I'm done with you. Bugger off, little peon.
